linetime.content:
I was born in Tegucigalpa during the month of October 1993, I originally received the name Charli as my first name, Yacniel turned out to be an adaptation of Jack Daniel's.
  • Father:Hello good morning, I have come to register my son.
  • Her:What is the first name?
  • Father:Charli
  • She: Mmm Charli?
  • Father:Yes Charli, it is.
  • She:Ah good, Charlies.
I kept memories of waiting for my father to return from work, because I always bring “Botonetas” (the m&m's of the not wealthy)
I cried on my first day of preschool, a year later I was sent to higher ground to escape Hurricane Mitch.
I met the Guns and Roses and Heroes of Silence, being tied for life to the genre and punctually to the song, 'Patience'.
I got my first PC with 256 MB of RAM, this and my copies of shortcuts on my flash drive were pure happiness.
I got to know the programming and made my first hello world in Pascal.
I took another step in the technology industry, I started my career in Systems Engineering.
I immersed myself in the world of mathematics.
I joined the Beanario startup meeting amazing people.
I jumped from a light aircraft at 11,000 feet (3.35 km) above the ground using a parachute, to celebrate that I had accomplished several personal milestones.
I survive the COVID-19 pandemic, meditating and studying online from my room.

testimonials.name: Skarllette Yasmín
testimonials.testimonial:
Charlies is a very helpful, friendly person, very responsible both personally and professionally, with extensive knowledge in the technological area, her various projects support her. Excellent to face individual or team projects, its collaborative spirit is always reflected.
Successes Ing. Charlies

testimonials.name: Tania Ordoñez
testimonials.testimonial:
Charlies is someone curious, she always has in mind to keep learning; has great problem solving ability. She is responsible, committed, creative, trustworthy;. Her capacity for project development is extraordinary. Successes!

PD: Charlies is a cat in boots without a doubt, his boots support him ha ha ha

testimonials.name: Nohemy Rodriguez
testimonials.testimonial:
Charlies Yacniel is a person with an extra bonus both to support and to learn, he is quite accessible, self-taught, independent, he likes to take on challenges, and he is not a conformist person. It is the perfect combination between a friend and a guide.

Professionally, he is very dedicated to his work and with a high sense of responsibility. Personally he is someone warm, kind, understanding and always pushing others to improve.

testimonials.name: Cindy Sarahí
testimonials.testimonial: Charlies is one of the people who never gives up, always wants to learn more, a noble, humble and above all responsible person.Each new project for him is a new challenge, he will never say no to something he does not know, because if he does not investigate it; A great experience to have him as a co-worker.

testimonials.name: Benesis Damaris
testimonials.testimonial:
Charlies is someone capable of solving any problem you put him, he will help you in whatever you want, he will accompany you on new adventures, and he will propose new challenges.

Do you have a technological project in mind? Well call Charlies.
And when the project is complete, we will go camping to celebrate.

testimonials.name: Melissa Castillo
testimonials.testimonial: He is a person who works hard to improve himself, always learning new things, looking at everything as an opportunity to make him grow as a person and as a professional. Always thinking positive, he is very happy, dynamic, sincere and with a noble heart. Very hard-working to support his family.

testimonials.name: Ivonne Amador
testimonials.testimonial: Excellent person both personally and academically, he has proven to be respectful, enterprising, responsible, proactive, seeks to deepen his studies, does not settle and always goes the extra mile, these are many of his qualities, but without a doubt the most important is his humility and the empathy he has with others.

portfolio.title: charlyes.com
portfolio.thumnail__descripition: A Solid Prestige Financial Institution needs define your new processes...
portfolio.text_presentation:
A Solid Prestige Financial Institution needs define your new processes for reconciliation automation of payments and collections, made by their clients through manual processes.

The web portal 'Conciliations' is the administrative module where Users can log in and proceed with the accounting balance between the fundraising institution and the area of information technologies.
portfolio.text_intervention: Charlies was assigned to this project to carry out the design and the development of a web application that would allow users carry out the validation process that was carried out form manual passing this to a form automatic, safe and consistent.
portfolio.text_challenge:
The project was approved in August 2018 ending inDecember of the same year, it was agreed to set a first part of themodule for that month and the rest for a second installment.
The main requirement for the operation of the project consisted oftake information from both entities, compare data, determinedeferred and generate alerts to users.
portfolio.text_hands_of_work: In this project there was a software requirement on which a portal guide was designed using mockups, these weredesigned by the graphic design team respecting the established graphic line.
portfolio.text_sumary: In the end I managed to finish the project as a quarantine goal, here is the result.<pr>As of today I can refer future clients to a personal portal that identifies me when I am not present.
portfolio.text_other:
The project management was carried out by the team of Project Manager of the “Financial Institution of Solid Prestige ”, they took control of the tasks of the project.


For the design and development of the project there was free decision inthe use of tools, as a newsoftware solution.

clients.name: Charlies Yacniel
clients.description: Necesitaba crear mi propio sitio web

clients.name: Solid Prestige Financial Institution
clients.description: The “Solid Prestige Financial Institution” is an institution bank with a long regional history in proposing products and provision of services to the community.

clients.name: Grupo Rentas Aduaneras
clients.description: The 'Grupo Rentas Aduaneras' is a government institution dedicated to the revenue collection item in national customs and international.
